item.title: Multi-User Video Conference with WebRTC
item.description: This is a tutorial for how to implement a multi-user video conference with WebRTC, AngularJS and Yeoman. It also includes a detailed explanation of how WebRTC works, how the peer to peer connections are being established and how the ICE (Interactive-Connectivity Establishment) framework is used for NAT traversal. You can find deployed version of the project, we’re going to take a look at in this tutorial, at Heroku, the source code can be found at GitHub.
